Description :-
Alan Wake's American Nightmare - shooter with elements of horror, designed by studio Remedy. The game is not a continuation or a prequel to the original Alan Wake. American Nightmare expands and deepens the universe of the game, adding previously unknown characters and events. At this time Alan Wake fight with Mr. Scratch, the messenger of darkness! New exciting story, hordes of terrifying enemies, strong arms and beautiful landscapes of Arizona, as well as exciting new regime will be a boon for fans of Alan Wake, but for everyone else - a great opportunity to get acquainted with the history of the writer.
